name: Halving
description: Halving Coin is a decentralized cryptocurrency running on Ethereum blockchain, under protocol ERC-20. HALV will be used within Halving platform to pay basic utility bills, such as electricity, water, gas, phone bills, cellphone recharges and other services. Top users of Halving platform will earn points, which can be exchanged for HALV or other cryptocurrencies, and thus obtain greater liquidity and traffic on the cryptocurrency.
